alert.note: Alert for Coastal Wakulla; Inland Wakulla; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 6:06PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Wakulla and southeastern Leon Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 605 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Tallahassee Comm College to near Crawfordville to 12 miles west of St. Marks. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... St. Marks, Crawfordville, Woodville, Tallahassee, Florida A And M, Florida State University, Doak Campbell Stadium, Wakulla, Lake Bradford, Ralford Greenway, Newport, Shadeville, Leon Sinks, Gaither Community Center, Lake Munson, Wakulla Springs, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp, Eight Mile Pond, Chaires and Bethel. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
